mapper.select: SELECT tb_article.* FROM tb_article WHERE id = #{id} AND is_delete = 0 FOR UPDATE

SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM tb_article a LEFT JOIN tb_article_category_relation ac ON a.id = ac.article_id WHERE ac.category_id = #{categoryId} AND a.status = 1 AND a.is_delete = 0 AND ac.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY a.id desc LIMIT 0,7;
